Credits

Source: vignettes/exsampler-credits.Rmd
exsampler-credits.Rmd

Credits

This app is built with and thanks to:

  • {shiny} – interactive app framework
  • {ggplot2} – plotting
  • {qqplotr} – QQ/PP geoms and confidence bands
  • {patchwork} – arranging multiple plots
  • {purrr} – mapping utilities
  • {glue} – labeling and string interpolation
  • {sn} – skew‑normal random number generation for examples
  • {stats} – base R distributions and tests (e.g., Shapiro–Wilk)

Author & assistance

  • Author: Daniel Wikstrom
  • Assistance: ChatGPT (OpenAI) — models GPT‑4o and GPT‑5 Thinking was used with code writing, review, documentation, and formatting.

If you use this app in teaching or publications, please cite these packages (see each package’s citation()), and acknowledge assistance as appropriate.

On this page

Developed by Daniel Wikstrom.
